target: Sure, and when will you be visiting the salon?
context: <user>  Hello, could you help me search for a salon in the SFO area please? <system>  Sure, there are 10 salons you might like in the San Francisco area, one of which is called 1512 Barber Shop. <user>  May I know what is their average rating? <system>  Their average rating is 4.8. <user>  Wow, that sounds good! <system>  Would you like me to schedule an appointment with the salon? <user>  Sure, please schedule one at 3:30 pm please. <system>
